EmailTemplate.name: 2011_VNS_UnitSwap_Email3_Recording
EmailTemplate.subject: Recording Available: Unit Swap Product Demonstration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Recording Now Available Product Demo: VisiCAD Unit Swap Module
Thank you for your interest in VisiCAD's Unit Swap Module product demonstration. With immediate notification of newly available and closer units, your agency will experience improved response times and resource management.
If you were not able to join the live event or wanted to share the information with someone else, please reference the links below for the recording and datasheet.
Click here for the Recording Link. http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ppzsbss Click here for the Handout Link. http://www.tritech.com/component/k2/item/download/39
If you have further questions or need more information please contact your Customer Account Managers Ken Schulte or Sally Olson-Nelson.
﻿
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
